mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BASKET B WHERE M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) AS BASKET, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO ) AS CONFIRM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND ORDER_STATUS = 2 AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '구매취소') AS CANCEL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '상품준비중' AND ORDER_STATUS != 2) AS READY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '배송중') AS TRANSIT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_PRO O WHERE M.MEM_NO = O.MEM_NO AND DELIVERY_STATUS = '배송완료') AS DELIVERED FROM MEMBER M WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , TOTAL_PRICE , ORDER_DATE , DELIVERY_STATUS , ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , SCRAP_COUNT , PR_REVIEW_ENROLLDATE "REVIEW_ENROLLDATE" FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = REVIEW_WRITER) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY PR_REVIEW_ENROLLDATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2
SELECT TO_CHAR(BASKET_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" FROM BASKET JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(BASKET_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') ORDER BY MONTH DESC

SELECT MEM_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_CODE , TO_CHAR(BASKET_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" , BASKET_DATE , BASKET_NO , AMOUNT , PRICE * AMOUNT "PRICE" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM BASKET JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY BASKET_DATE DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND DELIVERY_STATUS = #{deliveryStatus} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') ORDER BY MONTH DESC

SELECT OP.ORDER_NO "ORDER_NO" , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" , ORDER_DATE , ORDER_QUENTITY , ORDER_STATUS , DELIVERY_STATUS , PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_CODE "PRODUCT_CODE" , TOTAL_PRICE + DELIVERY_PRICE "TOTAL_PRICE" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO OP JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST OL ON (OP.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (OL.PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND DELIVERY_STATUS = #{deliveryStatus} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') ORDER BY MONTH DESC

SELECT OP.ORDER_NO "ORDER_NO" , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM') "MONTH" , ORDER_DATE , ORDER_QUENTITY , ORDER_STATUS , DELIVERY_STATUS , PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_CODE "PRODUCT_CODE" , TOTAL_PRICE + DELIVERY_PRICE "TOTAL_PRICE" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO OP JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN ORDER_LIST OL ON (OP.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (OL.PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_PRO SET ORDER_STATUS = 2 , DELIVERY_STATUS = '구매취소' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , ORDER_QUENTITY , TOTAL_PRICE , DELIVERY_PRICE , DISCOUNT_FEE , TOTAL_PRICE + DELIVERY_PRICE - DISCOUNT_FEE "TOTAL" , SELLER , SELLER_PHONE , DELIVERY_STATUS , DEL_NAME , DEL_PHONE , DEL_EMAIL , DEL_ADDRESS_CODE , DEL_ADDRESS , DEL_ADDRESS_DETAIL , DEL_ADDRESS_REF , MEMO , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE FROM ORDER_PRO JOIN ORDER_LIST USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
